item.description:
Looking for a great way to start the best the best day ever? Well, here it is!

We'll meet at the outdoor gym conveniently located end of the Sherbourn St. footbridge on the Esplanade.* We'll do 15 minutes of pushups, pullups and situps. I plan to jog about 2 miles there to warm up , and jog home after.
And, with the cold, the running, and the working out not withstanding, it should be the best morning ever!

b]Workout Details:
We meet Sunday's, starting around 9:30am we'll do a 15 minute circuit of push-ups, pull-ups and sit-ups/squats; your Choice.

What to Expect:
A seriously fun group of people, motivating one another to get fit in the wee hours of the morning

ALL ABILITIES WELCOME!!!

*Map:
http://maps.google.co...

Got Questions?
Email me!

Scott
TMIRCE

informalrunning.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: the most informal Sunday morning workout ever
